afk.back: You have %d new messages from the following people:
afk.help: To print the messages from the different people type #msg <number> or #msg all to view them all

misc.trade: You can't open this window while on trade.
misc.login_rules: If you log into this game, you accept the rules of Eternal Lands. Press F5 in game to read them.
misc.reconnect: Press any key to try again.
misc.license: Entropy says: U R 2 g00d 2 r34d +h3 license.txt? BTW, that license.txt file is actually there for a reason.
misc.sigils: This spell requires at least 2 sigils
misc.appropr_name: Use an appropriate name: Please do not create a name that is obscene or offensive, contains more than 2 digits, is senseless or stupid (i.e. djrtq47fa), or is made with the intent of impersonating another player. Take into consideration that the name you choose does affect the atmosphere of the game. Inappropriate names can and will be locked.
misc.edit_quantity: Rightclick on the quantity you wish to edit
misc.x_quit: Press Alt-x to close the game
misc.equip_here: Place an item in these boxes to equip it
misc.channel_help:
Click a Channel to join. You can be in up to 3 channels at a time.
To talk in a channel, type @ before your message. You do not have to type @ to talk in Local.

new.head: Head
new.userlen: Username MUST be at least 3 characters long!
new.passlen: The password MUST be at least 4 characters long!
new.appearance: Remember to change your character's appearance before pressing "Done"
new.max_digits: You can only have 2 digits in your name!
new.max_length: Names and passwords can max be 15 characters long
new.illegal_char: You have typed an illegal character!
new.p2p_race: You have to pay to create a char with this race
new.char_help: To customize your character and select name/password, press the buttons at the bottom.
new.confirmcreate: Click done again to create a character with that name and appearance.
new.zoom_in_out: To zoom in/out: Middle mouse wheel or Page Up/Down
new.rotate_camera: To rotate the camera: Middle mouse button or arrow keys

buddy.name: Name:
buddy.color_desc: The color you want your buddy to appear in in the list
buddy.delete_desc: Check this to delete the buddy from the list
buddy.request_dialog: %s wants to add you to his/her buddy list. Do you wish to allow it?
